contextual_rationale:
Here's the visual breakdown of your script, with each beat represented by a modern, flat-style infographic asset:

 This image represents the initial problem: "Paperwork hassle." A document icon with a prominent "X" or warning sign clearly indicates an issue with paperwork.

This image emphasizes the importance of documentation in Bangladesh. A series of document icons, including an export certificate and bill of lading, flow towards a checkmark, signifying completeness and correctness.

This visual illustrates the consequence of missing documents: the car being stuck at customs. A car icon is shown halted at a customs gate, with a document icon having a red "X" next to it, and a frustrated person.

This image introduces the solution: Carbarn's secure dashboard. A tablet or computer screen displays a clean interface with document icons and a prominent lock symbol, representing security and organization.
: This visual depicts the ability to track and download original documents. Arrows show documents moving from a cloud icon to a download folder, emphasizing the digital accessibility.

This image represents the "clearance time" and the smooth process with the C&F agent. A car drives smoothly on a road, with documents flying into a "cleared" box, and a handshake icon between two figures (representing the agent and the client) with a checkmark, indicating a hassle-free process.
